Room.Name: Phexton Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling on Phexton Road south of a garishly painted pawn shop.
Room.LongDescription: On the north side of the road is a tacky little shop with three brass balls suspended over the door. A sign on the door says, "No questions asked." Inside, you see a fat little gnome fingering his gold. The village wall on the south side of the road seems to be getting higher in the eastern direction.
